button_construct_doomrocket.componentleveltooltip: Doomrockets can only be built if your stockpile is not full, costing both Warp-fuel canisters and food. There is also a cooldown period after each Doomrocket is produced.

unlock_parent.componentleveltooltip: Develop upgrades within this panel to gain additional benefits and unique Regiments of Renown exclusive to the Forbidden Workshop.
